ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment to the position of special adviser to the Minister of Public Works and Government Services, DANIEL PAILLÉ of Montréal, Quebec, as Independent Advisor on Public Opinion Research, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term not to exceed six months.
